name: SFT Labs Showroom - Basic SFT Token

{"name":"ERC-3525 Finalization Remembrance #1","description":"About this SFT
ERC-3525 Finalization Remembrance SFT is a simple ERC-3525 token and has a fixed quota of 9.05 points for each unique address, alluding to September 5, 2022, the date ERC-3525 was finalized by the Ethereum Foundation.

To Participate
1. Follow SFT Labs on Twitter @sftlabsHQ
2. Mint the Remembrance SFT for free within the native infrastructure of SFT Labs
3.
